title: Heikinten No Reijou - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Aristocracy   Childhood Friends   Cute Story   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Otome Game   R-15   Reincarnation   Short Story   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Aoizumi
description:
Iris, reincarnated as a villainess in an Otome game, for the sake of avoiding her doom, decides to live as an average girl.

It is a story on how she tries to avoid this event.

There are a few elements from Otome games in Heikinten No Reijou. It is a heartwarming story.>
